string-array.name: news_of_world
string-array.item: A Civil War veteran agrees to deliver a girl, taken by the Kiowa people years ago, to her aunt and uncle, against her will. \nThey travel hundreds of miles and face grave dangers as they search for a place that either can call home.
Writers: Paul Greengrass,Luke Davies, Paulette Jiles
Stars: Tom Hanks, Helena Zengel, Tom Astor
